posts.post_content:
Nice photo,and seems to have scrapbook residue on back.
Scans attached?
----------SOLD---------
That scrapbook residue going through puberty?
Or pubic residue from a scrapbook. LOL

Now, if you were a true salesman you could have said the card was from the Dealey family and it is actual "hair" from Dealey himself....  oh, that's right, you're not part of an actual auction house that could have written that up in a nice 3 paragraph description...

Anyone want to write just ONE paragraph?  Call it a creative writing challenge... :p
